title: Iltizam Saadi
description: At Donation 10 Foundation, we are dedicated to helping Muslims strengthen their 'Iltizam Saadi' - their commitment to faith and community.

details.mission: To enhance the commitment of Muslims to their faith and community through various initiatives, ensuring they remain steadfast in their religious duties and social responsibilities.

programs.name: Faith Strengthening Workshops
programs.description: Interactive workshops aimed at deepening the understanding of Islamic teachings and how to apply them in daily life.

programs.name: Community Service Initiatives
programs.description: Engaging community service projects that allow participants to put their faith into action and support those in need.

details.beneficiaries: Muslim individuals and families seeking to strengthen their religious commitment and community involvement.

title: Save For Ambiya Ke waris
description: At Donation 10 Foundation, we uplift Islamic scholars, Hafiz, and Maulbi by ensuring their financial security and offering crucial support.

details.mission: To provide financial and material support to Islamic scholars, Hafiz, and Maulvi, ensuring they can focus on their religious duties without financial burden.

programs.name: Scholar Financial Assistance
programs.description: Monthly stipends and grants provided to scholars and religious leaders to ensure their financial security.

programs.name: Housing and Healthcare Support
programs.description: Providing housing assistance and healthcare services to scholars in need.

details.beneficiaries: Islamic scholars, Hafiz, and Maulvi who are dedicated to preserving and teaching Islamic knowledge.

title: Dini Knowledge
description: At Donation 10 Foundation, we empower Muslim students with essential Islamic knowledge, fostering a deep understanding of Islam's true teachings.

details.mission: To empower the next generation of Muslims with a deep understanding of Islamic teachings, enabling them to live faith-centered lives.

programs.name: Islamic Education Classes
programs.description: Comprehensive Islamic studies classes covering Quran, Hadith, Fiqh, and more.

programs.name: Scholarships for Islamic Studies
programs.description: Providing financial assistance to students pursuing higher education in Islamic studies.

details.beneficiaries: Muslim students of all ages seeking to deepen their understanding of Islam.

title: Know Who You Are
description: At Donation 10 Foundation, we delve into the inspiring history of Islamic fighters, reminding us of Islam's strength and resilience.

details.mission: To educate Muslims about the rich and inspiring history of Islamic leaders and fighters, fostering pride and a sense of identity.

programs.name: Historical Seminars
programs.description: Seminars and lectures that explore the lives and legacies of key Islamic figures throughout history.

programs.name: Cultural Heritage Tours
programs.description: Organized trips to historical Islamic sites to provide firsthand experience of Islamic heritage.

details.beneficiaries: Muslims seeking to learn more about their heritage and the history of Islam.
